title: Excerpt from Tschaikowsky's "Pathetique Symphony"; Liszt's "Hungarian Rhapsody No. 2"
brief_description: The Bournemouth Municipal Symphony Orchestra conducted by Richard Austing present an arrangement by M. de Wolfe of an exzcerpt of Tschaikowsky’s Pathetique Symphony and Liszt’s Hungarian Rhapsody No. 2.
